subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Last season, Michigan scored as time expired to defeat a previously unbeaten Penn State, 27-25, and all but end the Nittany Lions’ chances of playing in the Bowl Championship Series title game.
snippet: Last season, Michigan scored as time expired to defeat a previously unbeaten Penn State, 27-25, and all but end the Nittany Lions’ chances of playing in the Bowl Championship Series title game.
